page.title: 19Ladock Children's Toys
page.content: The 30 infants in Ladock School told us about the things they play with. Nearly everyone has a Teddy Bear. Even the boys have dolls, they are called Action Men. The girls play with dolls called Barbie or Sindy. Many children have hundreds of model soldiers or cars. Several children have train sets and dads like to play with them too. The boys like toys like tractors, diggers and other mechanical toys. The girls prefer to play with dolls and toys where you have to pretend. The children said that if they had lots of money they would spend it like this. 1 girl would buy a Teddy, l8 boys would buy space toys, 2 boys would buy train sets, 7 girls wanted dolls and 2 would buy a toy gun. Many of the girls liked dressing up in old clothes.Other popular toys were Noah's Arks, dolls houses and prams.
